name: GreatInventions
0:
”Alexa, Open Great Inventions.”
”What are great inventions.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: great inventions
des:
Great Invention Skill, it is a skill which is primarily a fact basis skill that can be used by all age groups people including kids, teens, adults and olds. 
This skill will tell you some of the greatest inventions with the year in which they are invented. From basic tools to super inventions including TV, Smartphones etc, human inventions transformed the life on Earth. 
This skill will tell you random facts everytime which are good for general knowledge and would be helpful for students as well.

No special permission sought.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
